0:
domain = "${APP_DNS_APPNAME}"
origin = "https://${APP_DNS_APPNAME}"
tls_chain = "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key = "/tls/privkey.pem"
role = "WriteReplica"
log_level = "verbose"
bindaddress = "[::]:8443"
ldapbindaddress = "[::]:3636"
trust_x_forward_for = true
db_path = "/data/${APPNAME}.db"
db_fs_type = "other"
[online_backup]
path = "/backup/"
schedule = "0 0 22 * * * *"
versions = 7
Gitea for ${SECRET_DOMAIN}: Git with a cup of tea
The Archive Team Warrior virtual archiving appliance.
